website_summaries.verdict: This 3-tiered rack is a great option for bakers with limited counter space.
pros: The nonstick racks set up easily to cool a full batch of cookies in a cramped kitchen
Despite its collapsible design, it boasts a sturdy construction
cons: The 3" clearance between tiers may not allow enough space for cooling cake layers
Smaller cookies may slip between the bars, which are 3/4" apart

customer_reviews.title: Why not 5 stars?
customer_reviews.text: I was so hoping I would finally have the perfect cookie racks. They are so easy to put together, hold a batch of cookies, dishwasher proof! So what's wrong with them?? They were OBVIOUSLY not designed by a cookie baker. Racks are 3/4 inches apart, and cookies fall through. A real pain! So you stand there and carefully place one cookie at a time. I make a lot of cookies and this is a serious flaw. I'll just keep on looking!
customer_reviews.author: SHOES!

customer_reviews.title: Slats too far apart!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid baker and loved my old Wilton stacking racks but they had rusted pretty badly and I finally replaced them with what I thought was the same product. I don't know why they did this but the slats are too far apart (maybe 1/2" apart) so soft cookies weep right through and smaller food items fall through. The metal is also a smaller gauge than previously so the quality isn't as good. Now I'm looking for something else. This sucks.
customer_reviews.author: sonadora

customer_reviews.title: RUST!
customer_reviews.text: We just recieved this and opened the package. It seems as if this well known brand has opted to make this item cheaply. The coated rails are done so poorly that when opening the package rust was visible IMMEDIATELY. VERY LET DOWN. I will no longer purchase items from Wilton
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R.

customer_reviews.title: WOBBLES, BUT STILL GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Definitely saves space. I don't know if I'd trust it when stacked for anything as heavy as a cake since it wobbles, but it is great for our cookies and muffins. Hopefully this review was helpful to you!
customer_reviews.author: Solumadur

customer_reviews.title: Update: HORRIBLE! #WILTON
customer_reviews.text: Update : They seem to be making these differently. There's not a double set of wires that run through it. It's now VERY FLIMSY! Very dissspaointed with these! Place one pumpkin roll or a loaf of banana bread on it and they bow in the middle, the legs spread out and the entire rack sags. All 3 are the same. HORRIBLE for wilton! Useless you use them for something extremely light don't waste your $. Great for quantity baking. This is my 4th set because they're so handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: They're alright
customer_reviews.text: I make lots of cookies and simply needed additional drying space. I thought the use of vertical space would be perfect. I'm not wild about these. They are a bit flimsy and the space between racks is shallow. You're better off stacking them after you've put your cookies on. I also dislike that there is no easy way to connect them for strorage purposes. Perhaps welded clips or something similar to allow the items to be clipped together. In the end, they work, but they aren't great.
customer_reviews.author: TruRevu

customer_reviews.title: Better use of my tiny counter space
customer_reviews.text: My counter space is tiny in my current kitchen - literally 6 sq ft, about 2 linear feet of room due to the corner. So having stacking cookie trays is AMAZING. I only wish they has a better stacking system that didn't rely on the edges to hold each other up - small pegs on the outside of the trays or something like that would make me able to fit more cookies on each tray. But I still plan to buy another set because they've done great things!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent racks for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: They're working great for eclairs and cookies. Others have complained about the wires being too far apart to hold cookies. I dunno what crumb-sized cookies they're making, but my little 1" cream puffs and meringues don't fall through. Anyone making 3/4" cookies is a sad sad human. These racks also support my big-ass honey roll cakes (which can get pretty hefty). Even stacked these are fairly sturdy. They're not pretty, tho, but does that matter?
customer_reviews.author: Copperrein

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great price but not as sturdy as I had hoped. I was going to use them for paint pouring art. But they wobble and the legs stick up a little when fully extended, so that's not good for keeping canvases level. If i accidentally nudge it, Im concerned my art will go flying and the racks will collapse, making a huge mess. So I sent them back and now have the cooling racks that sit closer to the tabletop. I had a friend make me some wood risers with slots on the top for the feet for sturdiness and so I can make the new rack higher if need be.
customer_reviews.author: British Professional Organizer

customer_reviews.title: Whether cookies or paintings, these rule
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these because I need some for baking and I took my older set to use as drying racks for my paintings. The legs are a bit wobbly if you try to stack them as pictured after you have put something on them. It is best to stack them first, and then put the cookie sheet/pan/painting on them. I may need to buy another set so I can stack more paintings vertically in my tiny studio.
customer_reviews.author: Annazon

customer_reviews.title: Best cooling rack design ever!!! Excellent for those with not a lot of counter space!
customer_reviews.text: These are stackable and you can do so as you use them... fill up a layer, add a rack, fill it up, add another. They stack great and are not the sturdiest, but serve it's purpose and take up very little counter space. Perfect for when baking a ton of cookies and you don't have the room to scatter them all over the kitchen. LOVE IT and will buy another set again soon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and unstable
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to have his for my baking project but I spent more time trying to get the legs to stay stacked together than my baking ... I was annoyed that the legs don’t actually stack on top and stay in place but it’s very flimsy and breaks down if you are not super careful... I ended up using zip ties to tie them all together but that kind of defeats the intended purpose. I had the top rack cave in on my cookies and ruined a good batch of iced cookies. Wasn’t happy baker.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: They're not super strong, if I wanted to bend them I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have limited counter space living in a NYC apartment and these are really helpful. I have not had issues with flimsiness described in other reviews. They're not super strong, if I wanted to bend them I probably could, but if you don't beat them up they're fine. I keep them stored in the original box, it takes some finagling to remember which way to stack them so they fit properly in the box but other than that they're good and do their job.
customer_reviews.author: R. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooling rack
customer_reviews.text: I tend to bake a lot and it's things like large batches of cookies and bars and little cakes. I don't have a lot of counter space so that mean's the only way to go is up. I had low expectations but this set is really nice. I never really need more than just the three because by the time I need more, I can transfer some of the baked goods off of one of them, but if I ever did, I could buy another set and they'd stack just fine on top of these ones! They sit very well and don't wobble. Quality is A+ as you'd expect from a Wilton product. So glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Evangale

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving. Mom and Girlfriend Approved
customer_reviews.text: My mom and girlfriend absolutely love these I got them for Xmas cookie baking and they used the crap out of them and loved how they saved space since they stacked Theyre good for bigger cookies like snickerdoodles and pecan tassies etc If your cookies are too small, could use silicon mat or something. Or buy a different style rack 8]
customer_reviews.author: Holydiver951

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this today I opened like a little kid at Christmas time... Beautiful... Feels sturdy to handle, looks elegant and classy, nice spacing and easy to lift and sit on the next one. I can't wait for Sunday so the rest of my goodies arrive and I can go wild baking fruit pies for my family this set of cooling racks are going to be my new kitchen friends!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A must for any baker
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second set of these that I have purchased. I love that they are stackable, which saves counter space when I'm doing a big that's of cookies, like around Christmas. They are very sturdy, and the legs fold under so they're easy to store. I highly recommend these for anyone who likes to bake.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Unstable, wobbly legs
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, poorly executed. Each cooling rack wobbles making the structure highly unstable especially when stacking. Legs don’t stay in position, making it easy to kick in or out. Not sturdy at all. Dropped a whole rack of danishes because the leg collapsed inward on one side as I was taking one rack off the top of it. Not sure if this is how they all are, but definitely would not buy again. I like that they are stackable but not worth it if it doesn’t stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Don't toss your cookies!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great idea but maybe not so much. Basically I do not have confidence that the trays won't crash with an accidental brush against it. Each tray has two "legs" which unfold then you stack them on each other. But those little legs don't lock into place and the least little bump will toss your cookies all over the table or floor. I don't use them stacked which is the whole reason I got them. I just keep the legs tucked under and use them individually. I should've done better research.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Not Wilton's Best, By Far...
customer_reviews.text: I bake a lot around the holiday season, so I picked up two of these last year to help me cool more cookies at once. This serves that purpose, but just barely. It's a bit flimsier than I expected it would be, which was disappointing. I enjoy Wilton items overall, but I will say this is one of the lesser quality items I've purchased from them. It worked well enough to be useful for a few years, but I will not be repurchasing this item. 2.5 out of 5 stars, and that is being generous.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGeekyGirlTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Functional but not the same quality as previous ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I was hosting a large cookie making party. I have Wilton cooking racks from about 10 years ago and they are sturdy and I love them. These were not the same quality. They were thinner and did not sit perfectly flat on my counter. They rocked a lit on the legs. They worked fine for cookies and I am keeping them but there are not the same as my older version.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingMom456

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: love love love. this was critical when I had to bake two batches of sugar cookies (65+ cookies!!). Used them to cool the cookies and again after frosting the cookies while the frosting hardened. So easy to clean - some of the frosting had hardened but after rinsing in hot water. dried on frosting came right off with a sponge. After drying, I stored it back it the box and it fit nicely in my cabinet. I'd buy a 2nd set in a heart beat (if I needed it).
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Saggio

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement for Old Cooling Racks
customer_reviews.text: I really like the non-stick coating on these racks. My old tiered/stacking racks like these needed replacement. While I did not read the description that state the size (mine were smaller), I appreciate the full size as these racks fit completely in my baking sheets. Used them already and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookie Rack
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use for Christmas Cookies, same exact rack as the one Pampered Chef Sells but I got 3 for 1/2 the price of one rack from PC. I had been using the racks for a few weeks, easy to clean, sturdy, and solid, I do not stack them but would recommend them for anyone baking.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE This Cooling Rack! Works Great & Takes Up Minimal Room!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT COOLING RACK! Wanted something that would take up less of a footprint but allow stackable storage for both storing as well as cooling. This was IT! Great layout of the product to allow stackable racks and plenty of room for air flow to cool your baked goods faster! Takes up barely more room in the pantry than our cookie sheet and the stackable feature helps with keeping them all together in one spot! Clean-up has been a breeze as well with warm soapy water!
customer_reviews.author: ShakikiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space to hold dozens of cookies for cooling or glazing
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this year's ago! This rack is perfect for drizzling sugar glaze on cookies and letting them dry rather than on the cookie sheet. Since I bake so many, I need to remove them from the sheets to bake more and these hold a lot of cookies for cooling or sugar glazing.
customer_reviews.author: Domo

customer_reviews.title: Space saver and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve been using this eversince I got them. It saves you so much space in the kitchen and it is easily stackable even when you are just cooling down your cakes, cookies, cupcakes or any other baked products. It’s pretty sturdy and it doesn’t take too much space for storage because the legs are foldable. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Abee

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small kitchens
customer_reviews.text: The fact that they are able to stack ontop of eachother makes their foldout legs a bit longer than comparable wire racks. But if you don't have a ton of counter space, these are the cooling racks for you. I've even cooked with them ontop of a shallow roasting pan and worked great so far. No harder to clean than any other baking rack. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Becky K

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: I have very limited counter space and love to bake. This item came in very handy when I was baking cupcakes for my son's birthday. While they are slightly "wobbly", if put together right they work great. I recommend putting the bottom one on a towel, as they can tend to slip around the counter. They fit all 28 cupcakes no problem. I'm a big cookie maker too, so I can wait to use them for that!. I would recommend this product; its a great space saver!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: When I took it out of the box one of racks legs was not attached. I haven’t been able to figure out how to fix it. Otherwise they seem decent. I was really hoping they would be more sturdy and obviously not arrive broken.
customer_reviews.author: katey clack

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I probably would like these fine if I didn't already own a few professional racks. I think I'll hand them down to my daughter, she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The Best cookie racks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these racks. I’m always giving them as gifts. They are sturdy and are easy to stack so it doesn’t take up counter space. The cookies lay flat and can cool evenly. They’re super easy to clean. In fact, the cookies don’t stick to the rack so there’s very little cleaning involved. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Chari Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My mom makes close to 800 cookies every Christmas because she puts together massive trays for gifts and this has helped her so much. She used to line the countertops with paper towels and put them there but now she can at least cool a couple dozen while preparing something else. It streamlined her process pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: ZMan1993

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking cookies
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife who bakes and decorates lots of cookies at the same time. Perfect for making more vertical space instead of using the entire table. Not the most stable when stacked more than 3 or 4 high but it's doable. She loves them and they've held up very well over the years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Really useful cooling racks.
customer_reviews.text: Because these cooling racks stack in nested fashion, they are very easy to store. I like everything about them....in use, they can be stacked one atop the other so they save space....helpful in a small kitchen if one bakes a lot. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: sandiebee

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the best cooling rack of all time for cookie bakers
customer_reviews.text: Wilton does it again! This is absolutely the best cooling rack of all time for cookie bakers! If you have limited counter space and bake often, you may want to consider this 3-tier cooling rack. It allows you to cool everything, especially cookies, in a limited amount of space which allows you to prepare more foods at the same time or simply keep your counters clutter free when you are baking! Very nice purchase, I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not durable falls apart easily along with my cookies
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to use and it fell apart as I went to grab a cookie off the tier rack. Not durable at all. I was hoping it would lock in place but it didn’t .
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: nice.
customer_reviews.text: The ones I got one of them the legs were a little off. So they would not sit quite right stacking. I bent it a little and its ok but not quiet as good as a friend similar set. All told though they are a great price and it is a little nit picking I admit. I would not feel bad recommending them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Almost what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed a set of cooling racks and these appealed to me as they are stack-able so as to take up less room on my counter top. They do stack and they can take up less room on my counter top. I also bought them because they are similar to some my aunt has that I have used frequently in the past. These are not as sturdy or heavy duty as I would like. They are fine for cooling things in pans or trays, but the wire is spaced a little wide for cooling things like cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Hitt

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't have this in my life sooner! I love to bake and have a very small kitchen. It's been pretty tricky with just a single tier cooling rack that only holds about 1 1/2 dozen cookies. This thing is brilliant. Stacks easily and is pretty sturdy. And for the price, even more worth it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lee RTop Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, price. Collapisable,use seperate
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and price. These collapse for easy storage or can be used each separately which makes the racks easy to clean. If you have limited counter and cabinet space these are great. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

customer_reviews.title: i ended up buying more because i love them so much
customer_reviews.text: i ended up buying more because i love them so much!!! i use them to cure my soaps. i have nothing bad to say!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Love this stackable Cooling rack!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stackable wire cooling rack. It has made my baking life so much easier. You can use 1 or 2 racks or use all 3 which I always do. Instead of having cooling racks taking up my table space this stackable is a lifesaver and space saver. Great durability and price!!! Happy Baking
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie

customer_reviews.title: Newer Version is Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a wedding gift 12 years ago. They were fabulous, and I really used them well. My child broke one of them, so I decided to get a new set. Comparatively speaking, the newer version is a total disappointment. The metal is significantly thinner and less sturdy. The bars are not straight on my set, and the racks bow, they don't even sit flat. They are sufficient for my baking needs but are not at all the same product I got 12 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: K Crew

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I had some similar cooling racks that I've had for years, and were not useable anymore. I saw these and was happy to find the Wilton brand. These are so durable and heavy, so I know that they will be long lasting. Very happy with these and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: poopsy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the quality of these cooling racks.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would have been a bit sturdier to use. The feet of these cooling racks are very fleamsy. The legs collapse almost instantly if you don’t stand them up right. They wire is also very thin. I’m use to my Pampered Chef cooling rack which I’ve had for years. It’s very sturdy and can place a hot 9X16 glass dish without it collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy72

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I like that they fit in the cabinet, they are difficult to set up one-handed. Sometimes you already have the baking sheet or pan in your hand and you'd like to whip it out fast, but the legs do want to fold in. It takes two hands.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for price of three
customer_reviews.text: Comes preassembled, easy to use, fits most baking pans, oven safe. Very flimsy, feels like the legs will fall off easily
customer_reviews.author: Monique Mackay

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!! I got 2 sets of these so I can stack 6 high. I'm new to cookie decorating and have made up to 7 dozen at a time. With that many cookies, you run out of counter space. These are awesome! I wouldn't put anything too heavy on them, they do not appear to be made for heavy items. I use mine for cookies and it works great! I really like that you can use 1, 2 or all 3 and in my case, all 6!!! Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: D. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: The best cookie rack I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookie rack! It is easy to store and easy to set up. I am happy that it doesn't take up a huge amount of counter space when I use it because you can stack them. It's easy to clean and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to something better
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are cheap and flimsy. The lines are far enough apart that you will struggle to place muffins and such on them. They are easy to clean and stack but a very low end product.
customer_reviews.author: jaded928

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Ehh, just ok. Not as sturdy as I had hoped, they collapse easily when trying to stack and load up more cookies. These did help add more space during our marathon cookie making weekend but almost weren't worth the hassle due to unsturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to dry my sugar cookies. I'd love it if the racks were a little more sturdy. There's been several times I've almost ruined my cookies trying to stack the racks once they're full because the legs not being very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Row

customer_reviews.title: Cheesecake Solution for my freezer.
customer_reviews.text: I make multiple cheesecakes at different times of the year and I needed extra space in my upright freezer to stack more than one on a shelf. I purchased 3 sets of these cooling racks which now allows me to make and freeze up to 12 cheesecakes at a time. Wonderful item. Clean up is a cinch, I just put them in the dishwasher and turn it on. Really a great item for me in my baking business. I also use them for cooling cookies at other times.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Why so many negative reviews?
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why there are so many negative reviews on this cooling rack. I absolutely love mine in fact I plan on purchasing another set for myself. Not only that but I plan on purchasing a set for my step mother as well. I have very little counter space in my apartment so I can't have several cooling racking laying around. This 3 tier cooling rack is perfect for me since it takes up little space. If you bake a lot of cookies or you know someone who does I highly suggest buying this cooling rack. It is very sturdy but it is only meant for cookies. I would not use it for cooling cakes, brownies, cupcakes or pies.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Time for Cookies!
customer_reviews.text: Makes baking so much easier with this stacking rack. I was really excited for this arrive and it doesn't disappoint. When it collapses for storage its not exactly flat but it is is still compact enough to slide in with my baking sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Good Racks
customer_reviews.text: nice sturdy racks -- a little longer in length. I paid much more for a set not as nice. this stands very nicely. the biggest "problem" was getting the bottom feet to stand and only because you need to use two hands!! very easy to use, and exactly what i needed. i wish i had seen it before buying the more pricey version!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Gilkey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsier than expected
customer_reviews.text: While compact, and I didn’t get out the measuring tape before I bought them...they are smaller and flimsier than expected. I probably won’t end up using them to stack very often.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good for cookies
customer_reviews.text: Okay these are great for the space and price. However I but a heavy loaf of bread and wires started to bend. They already have rust on them and I’ve own them less then a month. Won’t buy them again. But they are great for cookies.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Cooling cookies is a breeze now
customer_reviews.text: The racks are super easy to unfold and stack. Cleaning them is fast. My only complaints are that they do not lock in place when unfolded or stacked. One small bump and they come falling down. Maybe I’m not doing something right? Otherwise, I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Peyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Wilton is the best for Bakers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these originally because I have a small kitchen, and really needed a better way to cool cookies/ cupcakes, so that they didn't take over my kitchen counters or tables. I really love that they can stack and still serve their purpose. They seem very durable, and are easy to clean. I even used one of them when it was folded to set underneath my Thanksgiving turkey, and it served the purpose for that as well. Great product. Wilton is really the best for bakers.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but I like them
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is just 3 stackable racks. I can use as many as I need and stack them or speard them out. One of them was a bit curved and they're a little rusty at the joints, but they are great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Givens

customer_reviews.title: Not a good Wilton product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is not working out so well for me. Doesn’t fold as flat as I had hoped! Be careful when you try to put more than one layer on they don’t like staying in place!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super Racking System!
customer_reviews.text: Really great racks. Sturdy when racked - was surprised! Can use individually too. Great that you can use both ways. Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: maitai

customer_reviews.title: Great at Christmas since I bake zillions of biscotti for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Only drawback is that the legs fold to easily. Wish they had a locking feature so the don't sometime collapse. I use alligator clips to keep the in place.
customer_reviews.author: NGM

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but rusty already?!
customer_reviews.text: I received this and it was rusty out of the box! The black coating had chipped off in several of the corners and it was rusting. I would have asked for a replacement if it wasn't ALL three pieces, but I really don't think that just three pieces slipped past quality control, I think it's just a cheap product. I think this is a really good product idea but poorly implemented.
customer_reviews.author: Seabiscuit

customer_reviews.title: Best cooling racks!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these cooling racks for 10 years and I recently bought a set for a wedding present. These are excellent cooling racks. You can cool a lot of cookies without taking up too much counter space. They go through the dishwasher well. After 10 years, mine still look new. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: StephanieC

customer_reviews.title: Better not stacked
customer_reviews.text: Individually the racks are nice, but stacked they are way to unsteady. I didn't trust layering my cookies on them because one slight bump and they would come crashing down.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: A little rickety but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my cookie business. They hold about one dozen sugar cookies - not as much as you'd think, because you have to leave room on each end for the next rack to be stacked. That wastes about an inch on each end, which sucks a little. They are perfectly stable when you have a full rack, but if you have just a few cookies on one, or have loaded only one side of the rack, they can be pretty wobbly. Overall they are ok. I use them all the time but wouldn't buy more.
customer_reviews.author: moosel

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected for the price. Will work for everything I need a rack for. Sturdy enuff for everyday baking and cooking. If you bake cakes that weigh like a bowling ball, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Frostfire

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 of them. Planned on giving 3 away as a gift, but I keep on using them. All of them. Need to find another gift idea
customer_reviews.author: Jud

customer_reviews.title: Unique use for shower
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for my shower shelf because I have a lot of hair items that stack up and it’s inconvenient to clean off the water/won’t dry. This has been a miracle and keeps everything so clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: These racks are amazing and essential for any home baker they are great because they can be stacked but the they are very durable I use them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Great space saver. Exactly as pictured. Compact for easy fold away storage. Keeps my counters clean while cooling my baked goods.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes Bijoux

customer_reviews.title: pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: This cooling rack is a must if you are like me and have a small kitchen with limited counter space but like to bake lots of cookies. I first thought the racks seemed a bit flimsy, but they work great and I have had no problems with them. They are easy to clean, and I like that you can also use each rack seperately, as well as stacked. The only minor complaint is that you can't slide the entire cookie sheet onto the racks when they are stacked, a drawback for those recipes in which the cookies need those last few minutes of contact with the hot pan outside of the oven to finish baking, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenwings

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product was received on time and in excellent condition. I am very happy with the purchase and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jon g

customer_reviews.title: I wish the legs had a soft lock on them so the would stay in position.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use them individually side by side for pancakes, french toast, or cookies but as the counter top fills up it is nice to be able to stack them. I wish the legs had a soft lock on them so the would stay in position. It would make them easier to stack. Stacked the stack can be a bit fragile and you could end up with a mess if you are not careful adding new items. I found the easiest way to store them is upside down on top of each other. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay open
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s something I’m doing wrong but it doesn’t stay open once you put the cookies on. It keeps collapsing making all my hard work go to waste. I opened and put it together as it said to and I’m spacing the thumbprints out. I tried putting less cookies on the cooling rack and still the same problem. I like it because it I can get it to stay open I can use it for cupcakes and any backed good to cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. I don’t stack them, but use them individually. Would be nice if the legs locked/clicked into place.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: This thing isn’t very sturdy it’s wobbly, it pinched my skin when folding it, and it’s a pain/hassle to clean
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great for cookies!
customer_reviews.text: When you have limited counter space, These are such a delight to have handy! The fact that they are simple to store and assemble makes for an enjoyable experience.
customer_reviews.author: Yeah buddy

customer_reviews.title: They don't take much room
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small kitchen and was nervous how to store this, but the legs fold down small and fits in my small drawer. they work just as well as I need them to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to stack, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: These racks are perfect for small spaces. I don't have much counter space but I was able to stack them up and cool all my cookies with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for letting my soaps cure and harden after cutting them. Going to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Zig Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love how it saves so much space even when it is put away. Individually it is light so I hang one on the side of my kitchen cabinet for easy access. It’s a little bit wobbly so you have to be careful not move it too much if you’re going to stack them. It’s a good product for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Nikx

customer_reviews.title: Stacked helps with small space
customer_reviews.text: These work nicely when you don't have a lot of counter space. They collapse well for easy storage. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: Best cooling racks that I've seen
customer_reviews.text: I use mine all the time and love the space these save by stacking! Easy to clean, as everything comes right off. I not only bake, but also have used them for dipped candies.
customer_reviews.author: Ahart

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love it 😍 i wasn't sure what to expect but i was pleasantly surprised by the product and how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.author: Darcia Yearwood

customer_reviews.title: Handy Cooling Rack
customer_reviews.text: This set of 3 stackable cooling racks seems to be well made, with one caveat. I was a little surprised that the legs don't lock into place (at least not that I can find), so you'll have to use both hands to hold the legs in place while sitting the cooling racks on the counter or stacking them onto each other. Otherwise they tend to collapse, potentially dumping your baked goods into the floor. The folding legs are nice when it comes to storing them, since they take up less space, but there really needs to be a way to lock them into place during use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tennant

customer_reviews.title: What did I do without them?
customer_reviews.text: Love these racks! Up until purchasing these racks I had some flimsy little wire things that I probably purchased at Walmart. They only stood about 1/2" off the counter so there wasn't a lot of circulation. But you do what you have to do. Finally I invested in this set of three and I LOVE them! There is plenty of circulation and they fold up nicely for compact storage! They also clean up very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Trish87109Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Used once and seems to be good just have to make sure the legs are put on straight to hook on next level properly
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Martindale

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have another similar set, and I do a lot of baking at Christmas. My first set is nice and sturdy. These feel cheap. They don't sit level and, though I haven't used them for anything heavy yet, I wouldn't be at all surprised to discover that they sag. They'll get the job done, but I'll be on the lookout for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Never again. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this product because my cookies keep slipping off of the rack and with cookies that take up to 3 hours to make, I don't want them to do that. Don't waste your money. Go get a cross grid. The bars also made indentions on my cookies because they're too far apart.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Cooling Racks
customer_reviews.text: This cooling rack is good for a number of reasons. First, it is well priced for the quality compared to the competition. Secondly, this rack stacks which is convenient if you are limited on space. It would be nice if the racks would snap together somehow, but instead they simply rest on top of each other. Finally, the space between the racks when stacked easily accommodates cookies, muffins, and bunt cakes. If you are baking something that rises quite a bit, then you can simply unstack the racks to give yourself enough space.
customer_reviews.author: ekkj

customer_reviews.title: I am returning them because they are very flimsy compared to the sturdy pampered chef stacking rocks I've had for years
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order these for a baking weekend. Unfortunately, I am returning them because they are very flimsy compared to the sturdy pampered chef stacking rocks I've had for years.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: They do not attach to each other. Could be knocked over if not put out of the way.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to display pies over Thanksgiving for space saving. I looked and looked for a pie display and came across this item. It worked wonderfully especially for fruit pies. The pies with high meringue I put on top. I bought two sets and stacked one, two or three high. With just one rack, pie went directly on buffet surface and one pie on top. These racks worked perfectly for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Heart

customer_reviews.title: 3 for 1!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time today! Wasnt aware it could be used separately or stacked! It's awesome! Easy to use! Easy to wash! Collapses fiat for easy storage! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amber mfin Savage

customer_reviews.title: Compact for storage
customer_reviews.text: Love how they fold compact and store easily. When open, I have only used 2 high for cakes and had no issue with the heaviness of the cakes. Looking forward to using all 3 for cookies.
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: Useful set of racks
customer_reviews.text: This set of cooling racks work wonderfully tiered or as three separate racks. They save a lot of space when tiered. However, if I need to decorate my cookies while they are still warm, I use them as standalone racks. I like them because when I have to make several large batches of cookies, I can quickly cool them all at once instead of having part of the batch become overly crispy on the pan.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Really well made and easy to fold down to store and add as cooling cookies!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a fantastic baker and these are great. Easy to fold down and store and easy to add a second or even a third level. Come apart easy to you can put cookies on rack easy and then add the other levels so it doubles and triples area! She loves me for getting this for her and make her cookie cooling so much better!
customer_reviews.author: PRO REVIEWER 88

product_meta.title: Wilton Excelle Elite 3-Tier Cooling Rack for Cookies, Cakes and More
product_meta.description: Love to bake but have limited space? This three-tiered cooling rack just solved that problem. It expands to 3 racks that stack on top of each other so you can cool batches of cookies, cake layers or countless finger foods all at once without sacrificing counter space. Once done, it collapses right back down for easy storage.
feature_bullets: Stacked cooling racks let you cool dozens of cookies or 3 cakes all at once without taking up a lot of space
Reinforced non stick coating for easy release and quick cleanup
Each rack measures 15.9 x 9.9 inches (40.4 x 25.1 centimeter)
Before first and after each use, wash in warm, soapy water for best results

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
